name: @nrk/yr-time
description: Efficient, immutable, utility for working with time/dates
author: Alexander Pope <alexander.pope@nrk.no>

scripts.build:docs: microbundle build --sourcemap false --entry src/index.test.js --output docs/index.test.js; node test/test-runner.js
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha docs/index.test.js --reporter spec --require test/mocha-setup.js
